function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to the virus at work","Impact":"Increased risk of contagious disease transmission, illness, and absenteeism","Mitigation":"Strict implementation of safety protocols, regular testing, and vaccination","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening devices, and air purification systems","People":"Employees, frontline workers, and staff in high-traffic areas","Owner":"Employers, health and safety managers, and government health agencies"},{"Description":"Lack of access to necessary tools and equipment","Impact":"Decreased ability to perform job tasks safely and effectively","Mitigation":"Provide appropriate tools, training, and resources for remote work","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and collaboration tools, virtual training platforms","People":"Remote workers, employees in need of specialized equipment","Owner":"Employers, IT departments, and remote work coordinators"},{"Description":"Home-related stress and conflicts","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health, well-being, and job performance","Mitigation":"Encourage flexible work schedules, provide mental health support resources, and promote work-life balance","Technologies":"Mental health apps, telemedicine services, and virtual support groups","People":"Employees, remote workers, and individuals with caregiving responsibilities","Owner":"Employers, human resources departments, and mental health professionals"}]}
